title: Killing General Graardor

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 20 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Money making guide/Killing General Graardor
Killing General Graardor
Requirements
Skills
  • 70+ required to enter Bandos' Stronghold
  • 80+ , , recommended ( 80+ strongly recommended)
  • 75+ strongly recommended to tank Magic attacks
  • 70+ recommended and must have at least 43 prayer for protection
Items
  • For recommended equipment and recommended inventory, see this page:
  • General Graardor/Strategies#Equipment
    • Quest
    Partial completion of Troll Stronghold - must have defeated Dad
    Other
    80+ recommended if using a ranged setup
    Eadgar's Ruse and 61 for Trollheim Teleport
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    3,288,660 27,030 9,010 6,760
    Inputs (612,140)Outputs (3,900,800)
    75 × Anglerfish (158,925)15 × Super restore(4) (228,840)10 × Super combat potion(4) (113,420)15 × Saradomin brew(4) (110,955)0.052 × Bandos chestplate (1,534,549)0.052 × Bandos tassets (1,210,740)0.052 × Bandos boots (12,254)0.039 × Bandos hilt (587,415)0.026 × Godsword shard 1 (4,135)0.026 × Godsword shard 2 (4,169)0.026 × Godsword shard 3 (4,124)13.29 × Nature rune (2,618)3.78 × Super restore(4) (57,660)3.78 × Grimy snapdragon (44,889)1.26 × Snapdragon seed (106,122)1.26 × Rune longsword (23,516)1.26 × Rune 2h sword (47,659)1.26 × Rune platebody (48,465)0.94 × Rune pickaxe (17,527)22.05 × Adamantite ore (24,318)148 × Coal (23,833)22.05 × Magic logs (22,598)1.26 × Adamant platebody (12,010)1.57 × GWD rare drop table (9,599)102,600 × Coins (102,600)
    Getting to the God Wars Dungeon.

    The profit rate assumes 20 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

    General Graardor can drop the Bandos hilt, Bandos chestplate, Bandos tassets, and Bandos boots, and he and his minions can drop parts of the Godsword. Apart from his unique drops, Graardor also drops a good amount of coins, herbs, and seeds.

    Like the other generals in God Wars Dungeon, he can be reached either by using an ecumenical key or by killing 40 of his followers. This can take up to 10 minutes by killing goblins that are near the arena. Once kill count is obtained, the player can enter the boss room.

    After slaying Graardor, go after his bodyguards. A solo trip can last multiple kills per trip, and it takes around three minutes per kill including respawn time.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.

[[General Graardor]] can drop the [[Bandos hilt]], [[Bandos chestplate]], [[Bandos tassets]], and [[Bandos boots]], and he and his minions can drop [[Godsword shard|parts]] of the [[Godsword]]. Apart from his unique drops, Graardor also drops a good amount of [[coins]], [[herbs]], and [[seeds]]. Like the other generals in [[God Wars Dungeon]], he can be reached either by using an [[ecumenical key]] or by killing 40 of [[Bandosian|his followers]]. This can take up to 10 minutes by killing [[goblin]]s that are near the arena. Once kill count is obtained, the player can enter the boss room. After slaying Graardor, go after his bodyguards. A solo trip can last multiple kills per trip, and it takes around three minutes per kill including [[respawn]] time. }} {{Money making}} [[Category:MMG/Combat]]
